mapper.select: select qna2booking, qna2category, qna2subject, qna2content, qna2created, qna2file1, qna2file2, qna2file3, qna2answer, qna2answercreated from qna2 b join member a on a.username=b.qna2username and (a.usertel=b.qna2usertel or a.useremail=b.qnauseremail) where a.username = #{name} order by qna2created
